resources.string: Don\'t doubt ur vibe - Elon Musk
- Swipe Right to go to the Menu
- Swipe Left to visualize your progress
- Tap your Yeti to add an activity
- Feed your yeti by opening your menu, selecting your activity and tapping him
Your Yeti\'s health bar is a 24 hour countdown timer. Once it reaches 0, it dies.
Health Points are used to increase your Yeti\'s health. The health points received by performing an activity is dependent on the frequency, and the current number of activities.
Your Yeti\'s level is incremented whenever the points bar is filled.
Points are used to increase your Yeti\'s level. The points received by performing an activity is dependent on the frequency, and the current number of activities.
You can delete an activity by holding down on the activity item on the menu. Be careful, you won\'t be able to recover your tracking data.
